attributes.action: Stop all politicians from using the term "salesman" as a derogatory term to infer that their opponents are conmen and frauds. As a salesman, I find this to be unfair and insulting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a sucessful saleman who is offended when the name of our profession is used in politics as a by-word for liars and fraudsters. I have never fiddled my expense account(!), do an honest days work, and actually supply goods to the government. If they truly do not believe in "being a salesman" then they could also perhaps do without the product expertise that I offer a major government department on a daily basis

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
